General.Name: Xiamen Wanli Stone Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Wanli Stone Stock Co.,Ltd develops, processes, and installs stone products, construction stones, stone carving handicrafts, and mineral products in China, Japan, South Korea, the United States, the European Union, and internationally. It offers slab, cut-to-size, countertop, vanity top, window sill, wall cladding, special shaped stone, garden and landscaping stone, sculpture, monument, and slate products. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.
